title: Ameri - Watch Face
summary: Infinite color combinations watch face, 90% parts customizable with color picker

descriptionHTML:
✔Ultra-high customizable watch face. Our goal is to give users as many options to customize as possible.
✔17 watch faces with time, date, battery, weather, temperature, number ticks, center dial, indicator background and more.
✔Create any color for the watch parts with our infinity color pickers
✔Control this app from your phone/tablet or your android wear watch.
✔Hundreds of watch face combinations are possible to your liking

Designed to work with Moto360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatch

To install:
1. After install, launch the Android Wear app, tap on the gear in the upper right corner and tap on "Resync apps"
(This may take a few minutes depending how many apps you have)
NOTE: this is not caused by this watch face, but rather the Android Wear app.

2. Choose THAAUS Ameri as your watch face. Long press on its icon to access settings.

3. You may have to wait a minute or so to transfer to your watch over Bluetooth

FEATURES:
✔ 17 watch background

Parts with color picker:- This allows you to customize the color for each part.
✔Hour, Minute, Second
✔Date
✔Weather
✔Temperature
✔Battery indicator
✔Number ticks
✔Center Glow

Features with Hide/Show:
✔Date
✔Weather
✔Temperature
✔Battery indicator
✔Rim edge (useful for LG R users)
✔Battery Background Mesh


This application is scalable for easy update in the future such as adding more designs.

If you prefer a different colors or see other themes:
Our store on Google Play is: https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=THAAUS

Information: Support, comments, updates
• Google community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/108429877838815336777

Sincerely,
Michael Au
Publisher ID: THAAUS
comments: As promised by Dev Awesome update Thanks,  thank you for your efforts and kept promises. Options are great and very customizable. Worth every penny indeed
LG G Watch R Top Dev top watch face, love it
Background Background color not changing. Stick on daylight no matter what I choose.
recentChanges: Version 1.3 - added color filter to most items on watch face so users can change to any color that you like.  added 10 presets for quick custom.
